name: Textual Walking
description:
As the title said, it's a walking simulator, but in text.

Minimum Requirements to Play the "Game" (if you can even call it one right now) :

  • A device that can run the command line prompt/console
  • A device that can extract .zip folders
  • A device that has .NET Core 3.1 Runtime installed
  • Every file in the "TextualWalkingSimulator.zip" folder
  • Ability to read the English language
  • Something that inputs what you type on it to the device
  • A simple understanding of mathematics (i.e addition, subtraction, coordinates, and angles)

Note :

Only has English language support for now; I will add other languages when I make this into an actual game
